channel.title: Do you use mangOH Yellow Embedded Antenna?
channel.description:
Hi mangOH Yellow users,
I'm taking the opportunity of [this article](https://www.microwavejournal.com/articles/34113-optimizing-wireless-connectivity-with-embedded-antennas) talking about how optimize your connectivity with the embedded antenna provided on the mangOH Yellow board to ask you the question: Do you use mangOH Yellow builtin antenna?
[poll type=regular results=on_vote public=true chartType=bar] # Do you use mangOH Yellow builtin antenna? * Yes * No; I didn't know about it * No; I did know about it but I prefer to use another antenna [/poll]
Thanks for your kind answer! Definitely feel free to leave a comment on why you do use it or don't use it, and definitely check out the article if the subject is of interest for you!
.Thibs.
